SELECT start_date AS date, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(course_name, 1, 3), ' 개강') AS memo, '개강' AS type, NULL AS holidayId FROM course
UNION ALL
SELECT end_date AS date, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(course_name, 1, 3), ' 종강') AS memo, '종강' AS type, NULL AS holidayId FROM course
UNION ALL
SELECT date, name AS memo, CASE WHEN name LIKE '%휴강%' THEN '휴강' ELSE '공휴일' END AS type, holiday_id AS holidayId FROM holidays
ORDER BY date ASC
